level.text: An appellant who is aggrieved by the Hearing Examiner’s decision may seek judicial review before the District of Columbia Court of Appeals in accordance with the contested case provisions of the District of Columbia’s Administrative Procedure Act, D.C. Code ยง 2-510.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Emergency published at 47 DCR 6035 (July 28, 2000) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Emergency published at 48 DCR 10067(November 2, 2001) [EXPIRED]; as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 49 DCR 2440 (March 15, 2002).
